issue_description: Outlook crashes when opening emails with attachments
solution: Update Outlook to the latest version and clear the attachment cache.

issue_description: Cannot connect to the VPN from home network
solution: Ensure you're using the correct VPN client version and reset your home router.
Check if the printer is powered on and connected to the network.
Verify your internet connection and reconfigure your email settings.
Ensure you have administrative rights and sufficient disk space.
